headline: ComEd Urges Eligible Customers to Apply for Energy Assistance as LIHEAP Application Period Launches Today
summary: CHICAGO, October 01, 2025--ComEd joined community leaders and stakeholders at the Community and Economic Development Association (CEDA) of Cook County, Inc. today to call attention to the launch of the new application period for the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Program (LIHEAP). The announcement was hosted at the North Lawndale Employment Network (NLEN), a cornerstone of the North Lawndale community, widely recognized for its leadership in workforce development and its role in connecting fa
